entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • -warnnotaserror does not work for warning NU1605 #37972
  • Rollback file based workload update fails to upgrade from 8.0.100 to 8.0.101 #37958
    8.0.1xx
  • [NETE2ESDK][MAC][Linux] With NET 9 alpha SDK installed, the maui-android workload manifest version should update to 9.0 after running ‘sudo dotnet workload update’ #37971
  • [NETE2ESDK][MAC][Linux]The welcome text should not keep showing up when running dotnet workload with sudo privilege. #37952

Closed

  • Unable to use `[env:key=value]` directive with 8.0.100 #37686
  • dotnet 8 SDK uninstalls dotnet 7 #36990
  • dotnet watch test doesn't run tests in dotnet 8 #34949
    8.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove the workload feature band #37974
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove unneeded strings from an error message #37973
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update manifests when rolling back for install after updating from rollback file #37966
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads, 8.0.2xx
  • Install manifests for rollback after update --from-rollback-file #37965
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads, 8.0.1xx
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2352720 #37964
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #37954
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #37953
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Re-enable env var directives in the .NET CLI #37827
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 8.0.2
  • Stabilize Branding #37967
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the more test frameworks #37925
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37955
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2352100 #37948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for Blazor webassembly projects (6.0) #37793
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • Remove TaskWithAssemblyResolveHooks #37913
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] [Wasm] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for wasm projects #37900
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for Blazor webassembly projects (7.0) #37794
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Handle HTTP 403 Forbidden in Containers #37660
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [WIP] Check PublishSelfContained #37693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Use runtime packs for NativeAOT on .NET 9.0 or higher #37872
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Compute SdkAnalysisLevel Property at the beginning of the SDK Targets #37778
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
